dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT cb.incident_attribute_1 order_no, xa.item_number, cb.incident_number, to_char(cb.creation_date,'MM-DD-RRRR') creation_date, cb.Incident_attribute_5 customer, cb.Incident_attribute_2 address, cb.Incident_attribute_8 email, cb.Incident_attribute_14 phone_number , DECODE(cb.incident_status_id, 9100, 'Cancelled', 'Active') active_status FROM CS_INCIDENTS_ALL_B cb, xx_cs_sr_items_link xa WHERE xa.service_request_id = cb.incident_id AND xa.attribute2 IS NOT NULL AND xa.attribute5 IN ('STB','VTB') AND TRUNC(cb.creation_date) BETWEEN nvl(to_date(:START_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), (trunc(trunc(sysdate,'MM')-1,'MM'))) AND nvl(to_date(:END_DATE ,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), (trunc(sysdate,'MM')-1)) ORDER BY cb.creation_date DESC
